content.raw: btw, for Gazebo 7 the the script [dependencies\_archive.sh](#!/osrf/release-tools/raw/default/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh) generates only `libsdformat4-dev` and `libignition-transport-dev` as dependencies. So it looks like `ign-math2` is missing. For Gazebo 8 and 9 the script correctly generates the same info as their corresponding debian control file.
content.html: btw, for Gazebo 7 the the script dependencies_archive.sh generates only libsdformat4-dev and libignition-transport-dev as dependencies. So it looks like ign-math2 is missing. For Gazebo 8 and 9 the script correctly generates the same info as their corresponding debian control file.
